pattern.name: Accented
pattern.description: Does the string contain a common accented character?
pattern.example: In some countries, Latin alphabet is enriched by accents. But it takes time to write these accents. Consequently, informal text is written without accents. While formal text is still written with accents. Thus, this feature can asses the formality of the entered text.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @base , case when translate(@nominalColumn, 'áàâãäåāăąèééêëēĕėęěìíîïìĩīĭḩóôõöōŏőùúûüũūŭůäàáâãåæçćĉčöòóôõøüùúûßéèêëýñîìíïşěščřžýáíéůúťňďÁČĎÉĚÍŇÓŘŠŤÚŮŽÝŽ', 'aaaaaaaaaeeeeeeeeeeiiiiiiiihooooooouuuuuuuuaaaaaaeccccoooooouuuuseeeeyniiiisescrzyaieuutndACDEEINORSTUUZYZ' )=@nominalColumn then 0 else 1 end AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable WHERE @nominalColumn is not null
